movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.movieSummary: Luke Skywalker, a young farm boy on the desert planet Tatooine, embarks on a journey to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader and help the Rebel Alliance in their fight against the Galactic Empire.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
movies.movieSummary: After the Rebels suffer a major defeat, Luke Skywalker goes to the planet Dagobah to train with Jedi Master Yoda, while his friends Han Solo and Princess Leia face off against the Empire's forces.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
movies.movieSummary: Luke Skywalker confronts Darth Vader and the Emperor, while the Rebel Alliance launches a final assault on the Death Star, leading to the ultimate showdown between good and evil.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
movies.movieSummary: Two Jedi Knights, Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi, discover a young slave named Anakin Skywalker who may be the Chosen One destined to bring balance to the Force while facing the emergence of the Sith.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
movies.movieSummary: Anakin Skywalker becomes a Jedi apprentice while the Galactic Republic faces growing turmoil, leading to the Clone Wars, a conflict that will shape the destiny of the galaxy.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
movies.movieSummary: Anakin Skywalker succumbs to the dark side and becomes Darth Vader, while the Republic transforms into the Empire, ultimately leading to the rise of the Rebel Alliance.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
movies.movieSummary: A new generation of heroes and villains emerges as the Resistance and the First Order clash in a galaxy still haunted by the legacy of the Sith and the Jedi.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode VIII - The Last Jedi
movies.movieSummary: Rey seeks training from Luke Skywalker, but the Resistance faces dire circumstances as the First Order closes in, testing the heroes' resolve and the power of the Force.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
movies.movieSummary: The Resistance faces the return of Emperor Palpatine, and Rey, along with her allies, must confront the ultimate evil while seeking to restore hope to the galaxy.
